metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6712 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel before 3.4, a buffer overflow occurs in drivers/net/wireless/iwlwifi/iwl-agn-sta.c, which will cause at least memory corruption.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6712` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-azure - 4.15.0-1002.2
